Active Skill.Name: Empress' Favor
Active Skill.Description: Restores HP (Regen Factor 183.6%/208.8%/234%/259.2%/284.4%/309.6%/334.8%/360%) to your 2 troops with the highest troop number losses and the 2 troops will regain HP (Regen Factor 61.2%/69.6%/78%/86.4%/94.8%/103.2%/111.6%/120%) for 6s with every successful hit with a Normal Attack.
